SEARCH
Module com.example.pong_project
Package com.example.pong_project.View

Class BallThreadHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.pong_project.View.BallThreadHandler
public class BallThreadHandler extends Object
The ball thread handler class is responsible for moving the ball and updating the score. It also handles the threading of the ball.
